title: [Evermore Hollow, River Entry]
description: Willow and alder trees rise in varying heights along the tumbling river's edge, their looping and spindled boughs laden with skeletal leaves of silver, ebon, and white.  Clattering and clacking in tune with the water's ambling chorus, tall reeds rise out of the muddy bank, resembling stick figures that are quietly watching the landing.  Clustered together, their lanterns creating pools of white illumination, a bunch of dark oak gondolas lie in wait for passengers to fill their interiors.
